name: Algebra I
subject: Math
description: Introduction to algebraic concepts and skills, including variables, expressions, equations, and inequalities.

reviews.comment: This class was amazing! The teacher was really helpful and made the material easy to understand.
I learned a lot in this class, but sometimes the teacher went too fast.

name: Biology
subject: Science
description: Study of living organisms and their interactions with each other and their environment.

reviews.comment: The material was interesting, but the teacher didn't explain things very well.
I enjoyed this class, especially the labs. The teacher was knowledgeable and approachable.

name: English Literature
subject: English
description: Exploration of classic and contemporary works of literature, including novels, poetry, and drama.

reviews.comment: I loved this class! The teacher was passionate about the material and really brought the books to life.
Some of the books we read were boring, but the discussions in class were interesting.

name: US History
subject: Social Studies
description: Survey of American history from colonial times to the present, including political, social, and cultural developments.

reviews.comment: I learned a lot in this class, but sometimes the teacher's lectures were a bit dry.
The teacher was knowledgeable and engaged us in discussions. I enjoyed this class overall.
